abstract: Israeli military ends service of 43 reservists from clandestine Unit 8200 who had signed letter refusing on moral grounds to participate in 'actions against Palestinians'.
lead_paragraph: The military on Monday terminated the service of 43 reservists who in September signed a letter refusing to participate in “actions against Palestinians” for moral reasons.
snippet: The military on Monday terminated the service of 43 reservists who in September signed a letter refusing to participate in “actions against Palestinians” for moral reasons.
